task.title: Install using the all platforms installer

taskbody.context: To install using the all platforms installer:

step.cmd: Start by running oxygen.shoxygenAuthor.shoxygenDeveloper.shsyncroSVNClient.sh, which is located in the install folder.

info.note: A Java virtual machine runtime environment (JRE) version 1.6.0 or later needs to be available.

note.p: To change the version of the Java Virtual Machine that runs Oxygen XML Author, go to the Java command at the end of the script file and specify the full path to the Java executable of the desired JVM version, for example:
